strength_details: Clear responsibilities focused on BI/DW, reporting, and ETL with Cognos
Established company (IBM) with global delivery centers and brand recognition
Role is specifically data engineering focused without scope creep
concern_details: Heavy reliance on legacy tools (Cognos, DataStage) with no modern stack mentioned
Onsite requirement in Pune may imply long hours or limited flexibility
No visa sponsorship mentioned - likely requires local work authorization
No work-life balance signals or PTO policy disclosed
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers with 3+ years in BI/DW and Cognos experience
Candidates experienced with batch ETL and traditional data warehousing
Those seeking stability in established enterprise environments
probe_details: Ask about the actual tech stack beyond Cognos and DataStage
Inquire about typical work hours and any on-call expectations
Understand career progression opportunities within IBM's delivery centers
Clarify team size and composition to understand collaboration dynamics
leverage_details: Cognos Developer/Admin experience is a required skill - strong match
BI/DW project experience with reporting/visualization is explicitly required
summary.overall_assessment: Stable opportunity for mid-level data engineers seeking enterprise experience with IBM. Clear role focused on traditional BI/DW with Cognos, but limited modern tech stack and innovation. Main trade-offs are legacy technology and onsite requirement in Pune. Suitable for candidates valuing stability over cutting-edge tech.
